00026 //! Build the graph of the domain that the METIS/PARMETIS/PTSCOTCH libraries need
00027 
00028 class Domain_Graph
00029 {
00030 
00031   friend class Partitionneur_Metis;
00032   friend class Partitionneur_Parmetis;
00033   friend class Partitionneur_Ptscotch;
00034 
00035 public:
00036 
00037   void construire_graph_from_segment(const Domaine& dom,
00038                                      const int use_weights );
00039 
00040   void construire_graph_elem_elem(const Domaine& dom,
00041                                   const Noms& liste_bords_periodiques,
00042                                   const int use_weights,
00043                                   Static_Int_Lists& graph_elements_perio);
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 private:
00048   int nvtxs;                        /* The number of vertices */
00049   int nedges;                        /* The total number of edges */
00050   int weightflag;
00051   ArrOfInt xadj;                        /* CRS storage scheme */
00052   ArrOfInt adjncy;
00053   ArrOfInt vwgts;
00054   ArrOfInt ewgts;
00055   ArrOfInt vtxdist;                     //for parmetis: distribution of the initial graph on the procs
00056   ArrOfInt edgegsttab;                  //for ptscotch: local numbering of vertices
00057 };
